title: My SN isn't displaying correctly on the forums.
body:
It displays as Light SSlind. I had accent characters in my old name and they displayed correctly so that's why I'm bringing this up.

It should be Light ßlind. 

Thanks.

replies.body: I'm seeing your post here as Light ßlind.  Is this still an issue?  There might be a font setting on your PC or language that's not showing it properly, though I can't say for sure.  Everything looks okay from our side, though!

Oh, It displays SSlind for me still but if you see it that way I imagine everyone else does as well. I don't mind as long as it displays to everyone else correctly.

Thank you.

Ohh, it does show up as SSlind in your comments (not original post).  The special character being used might not be supported on the boards.  I recommend submitting a report on the [bug boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) to see if it can be looked into.  Sorry about that!
Ah, heh. Ok I will; thanks.
Yeah!  I did try to sync up your boards profile just in case but no luck!
